text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that assigning responsibilities to the tenant does not remove the owner\u2019s responsibility for common or shared areas. The response explicitly addresses this in Section 3.2 (Your Company (Building Owner and Co-Occupier)), stating: \"As building owner, you have duties under Section 4 of HSWA that cannot be fully delegated to a tenant\" and later, \"The fire risk assessment you commissioned was deficient, and while you relied on professional advice...\" This clearly demonstrates the principle that the owner's responsibility remains despite the presence of a tenant/co-occupier.", "criterion_id": "61540037-65b5-4926-9628-43ec17bf3eec"}
